Actions.Name: Create Campaign Draft
Actions.Description: Create a new campaign draft. Newsletter and CampaignDraft objects are differentiated by the EditMode values.

Actions.Name: Create  Contact
Actions.Description: Add a new unique contact to your global contact list and select its exclusion status

Actions.Name: Get Campaign Draft By ID
Actions.Description: Get a specific campaign draft and its configuration details

Actions.Name: Get Campaign Overview
Actions.Description: Get general details and stats for all drafts, AB Testing objects and/or sent campaigns

Actions.Name: Get Campaigns Draft
Actions.Description: Get all campaign drafts and their configuration

Actions.Name: Get Contacts
Actions.Description: Retrieve a list of all contacts. Includes information about contact status and creation / activity timestamps

Actions.Name: Get Contacts Statistics
Actions.Description: Retrieve a list of overall aggregated delivery and engagement statistics, grouped by contact

Actions.Name: Get Messages
Actions.Description: Get a list of messages with specific information on the type of content, tracking, sending and delivery

Actions.Name: Get Messages Information
Actions.Description: Retrieve sending/size/spam information about all messages

Actions.Name: Send Email v3
Actions.Description: Send an email message via Send API v3

Actions.Name: Send Email v3.1
Actions.Description: Send an email message via Send API v3.1

Actions.Name: Update Contact
Actions.Description: Update the user-given name and exclusion status of a specific contact

Actions.Name: Update Contact List
Actions.Description: Update a specific contact list by changing its name and / or deletion status
